attributes.action: Provide furlough for staff of Cinemas Theatres Live music Arts venues
attributes.additional_details: Debate and vote for furlough and support for the arts in this country, once this panasonic has passed we will need entertainment and art to heal some of the stress this difficult time has brought.
attributes.background: With closure of major cinema chains many people are going to struggle and there is a real danger we will lose these venues, ARTS in this country must be protected. We ask that furlough be provided for the staff of Cinemas , Theatres Arts and Live music venues.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend furlough scheme for theatre and live music industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329174

Extend furlough scheme for the Cinema industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553253

Extend the government furlough scheme to those working in the events sector: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330804
